TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HostFileChangeMonitor extends System.Runtime.Caching.FileChangeMonitor
Public NotInheritable Class HostFileChangeMonitor Inherits FileChangeMonitor

summary.span: 监视目录和文件路径，并向缓存通知被监视项的更改情况。

span.span: Monitors directories and file paths and notifies the cache of changes to the monitored items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是具体的实现类型。The class is a concrete implementation of the type. 此类密封的因此不能对其进行扩展。This class is sealed, therefore it cannot be extended. 此类是非常有用，如果你想要使用现有的缓存实施和监视文件和目录的更改。This class is useful if you want to use an existing cache implementation and to monitor files and directories for changes. 为每个指定的文件或目录路径类触发更改通知，如果出现任何以下更改：For each specified file or directory path, the class triggers a change notification if any of the following changes occur: - 监视的文件或目录更改的名称。The name of the monitored file or directory changes. - 指定的文件或目录不存在时监视器已创建，但更高版本创建。The specified file or directory did not exist at the time the monitor was created, but was created later. 换而言之，文件或目录已在受监视项目的作用域中创建。In other words, a file or directory was created in the scope of the monitored items. - 更改被监视的文件的大小。The size of a monitored file changed. - 受监视的文件的内容发生更改，或受监视的目录内容发生更改。The contents of a monitored file changed, or the contents of a monitored directory changed. - 已更改文件或目录的访问控制列表 (ACL)。The access control list (ACL) of the file or directory was changed. - 已删除的受监视的文件或目录。The monitored file or directory was deleted. 如果在同一时间被监视的文件或目录发生太多更改实例可能会丢失对特定更改的跟踪。If too many changes occur for the monitored file or directory at the same time, the instance can lose track of specific changes. 在此方案中，类触发更改通知。In this scenario, the class triggers a change notification. 这种情况下是更有可能发生时实例监视一个目录，并在短时间内的目录结构的作用域中发生很多更改。This scenario is more likely to occur when the instance monitors a directory, and many changes occur in the scope of the directory structure in a short period of time. 因为的用途类只是通知发生了更改被监视的文件和目录的组，它不被视为重要不会捕获有关特定更改的详细信息。Because the purpose of the class is only to signal that something has changed among the set of monitored files and directories, it is not considered important that details about a specific change are not captured. 用途类是提供通知的状态更改，以便可以逐出某个缓存项 （或条目）。The purpose of the class is to provide notification that state changed so that a cache entry (or entries) can be evicted. 因为类并不表示实际更改的内容，内部更改跟踪溢出不起作用。Because the class does not indicate exactly what changed, internal-change tracking overflow is irrelevant. 提供的路径时实例、 目录和文件路径必须是目录或文件的完整路径。When you supply paths to a instance, the directory and file paths must be full paths to the directory or file. 不允许的相对路径和路径中的通配符字符。Relative paths and wildcard characters in paths are not allowed. 当在 ASP.NET 应用程序中使用类，用于访问受监视项目的 Windows 标识是 ASP.NET 应用程序的应用程序标识。When the class is used in an ASP.NET application, the Windows identity that is used for access to monitored items is the application identity for the ASP.NET application. 换而言之，应用程序标识将是以下值之一：In other words, the application identity will be one of the following: - 进程标识。The process identity. - 配置的应用程序标识。The configured application identity. - 如果该应用程序正在从 UNC 共享 UNC 的凭据。The UNC credential if the application is running from a UNC share. 当在非 ASP.NET 应用程序中，使用类类在内部使用，来监视文件。When the class is used in a non-ASP.NET application, the class is used internally to monitor files. 因此，任何访问控制列表 (ACL) 适用于受监视的文件或目录被应用于当前线程的 Windows 标识。As a result, whatever access control list (ACL) applies to a monitored file or directory is applied to the Windows identity of the current thread. > [!NOTE] > 调用方必须具有适当级别的代码访问安全性 (CAS) 权限，并且必须具有对所有受监视的目录和路径的 NTFS 权限。Callers must have the appropriate level of code access security (CAS) permissions and must have NTFS permissions to all monitored directories and paths. ## Examples 下面的示例创建使用的缓存项要监视文件系统上的源数据 （即文件） 的状态对象。The following example creates a cache item that uses a object to monitor the state of the source data (which is a file) on the file system. 使用定义的缓存项对象提供的缓存项的逐出和过期详细信息。The cache entry is defined using a object to provide eviction and expiration details for the cache entry. [!code-csharp[CachingASPNetApplications#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/cachingaspnetapplications/cs/default.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CachingASPNetApplications#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/cachingaspnetapplications/vb/default.aspx.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<string> filePaths) cil managed
Public Sub New (filePaths As IList(Of String))

param.name: filePaths
param.span: 包含要监视的一个或多个目录路径或文件路径的列表。

span.span: A list that contains one or more directory paths or file paths to monitor.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用构造函数必须提供一个非 null 值`filePaths`参数。Calls to the constructor must provide a non-null value for the `filePaths` parameter. 最小值，构造函数验证传递到它，然后初始化监视这些路径的路径的集合。At a minimum, the constructor validates the collection of paths that is passed into it and then initializes monitoring for those paths. > [!NOTE] > 构造函数执行字符串验证仅的路径名称。The constructor performs only string validation of the path name. 不规范化路径或验证路径存在。It does not canonicalize paths or validate that the paths exist.

exception.span: 列表中的路径为 或空字符串。

span.span: A path in the list is or an empty string.

Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property FilePaths As ReadOnlyCollection(Of String)

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取已传递给 构造函数的目录和文件路径的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of directories and file paths that was passed to the constructor.

value.span: 目录和文件路径的集合。

span.span: A collection of directories and file paths.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property LastModified As DateTimeOffset
public: virtual property DateTimeOffset LastModified { DateTimeOffset get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取一个只读值，该值指示所监视文件或路径的上次写入时间。

span.span: Gets a read-only value that indicates the last write time of a monitored file or path.

value.span: 所监视文件或路径的上次写入时间。

span.span: The last write time of a monitored file or path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果文件更改监视器监视多个文件或路径，此属性将返回集中的所有文件和路径的最新的写入时间。If a file-change monitor is monitoring multiple files or paths, this property returns the most recent write time in the set of all files and paths.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property UniqueId As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ UniqueId { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取基于被监视的目录和文件路径集的 实例的标识符。

span.span: Gets an identifier for the instance that is based on the set of monitored directories and file paths.
An identifier for the change monitor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构成的字符串属性值构造根据以下部分：The string that makes up the property value is constructed from the following parts: - 文件或目录路径。A file or directory path. - 最新的写入时间以 UTC 时间，单位为刻度数，但表示为十六进制字符串。The most recent write time in UTC time, measured as ticks but represented as a hexadecimal string. - 文件大小，表示为十六进制字符串。The file size, represented as a hexadecimal string. 如果文件更改监视器监视多个路径，此属性返回的信息被串联到单个字符串的所有被监视的目录和文件路径。If a file change monitor is monitoring multiple paths, the information returned by this property is concatenated into a single string for all the monitored directories and file paths.
